summary: In a post-Armageddon world, a young woman finds herself in a fight for survival against mutant cavemen, dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals.
cast: Paul Guzzi|Linda Corwin|Alex Pirnie|Mark Deshaies|Al Hodder|Russ Greene|Scott Ferro|Rick Stewart|Ryan Piper|Dusty McNeal|Quinn Piper|Melanie Pirnie|Jeneane Deprizio|Liz Prevett|Penny Townsend
title: A Nymphoid Barbarian in Dinosaur Hell
